Bind Armament.name: Bind Armament
Bind Armament.description:
You bind the weapon currently equipped in your main-hand as your Bound Armament.

While bound, you may conjure the weapon into a free hand without any resource cost. You can conjure the weapon across any distance including if it has been Disarmed.

Dawn Beacon.name: Dawn Beacon
Dawn Beacon.description: You call forth the piercing light of dawn that penetrates the darkness around you, revealing the area and dispelling sources of magical darkness.

Engulfing Darkness.name: Engulfing Darkness
Engulfing Darkness.description: You conjure an oppressive sphere of magical darkness that shrouds vision and suffocates light within its area.

Protective Mirage.name: Protective Mirage
Protective Mirage.description: You Aspect yourself in a mirage of shifting Illumination and Shadow which mask your current position and allow you to Elude incoming blows.
